NAME: Unit Price
DESCRIPTION: Display of the unit price. This is often used in communication with customers.

NAME: Compartment
DESCRIPTION: Information on the  compartment or silo to assist in picking.

NAME: Compressive Strength
DESCRIPTION: The load-bearing capacity of the material in built-in condition.

NAME: Consistency Class
DESCRIPTION: The consistency of fresh concrete is described using consistency classes.

NAME: Exposure Class
DESCRIPTION: Exposure classes define durability requirements for reinforcement and concrete corrosion depending on chemical and physical exposure conditions.

NAME: Moisture Class
DESCRIPTION: The moisture class categorizes environmental conditions related to potential harmful alkali-silica reactions, as defined by the project planner.

NAME: Application / Usage
DESCRIPTION: The planned application or use of the delivered concrete.

NAME: Strength Development
DESCRIPTION: Concrete is classified according to the development of its compressive strength as very slow, slow, medium, or fast.

NAME: Certification Body
DESCRIPTION: Accredited certification body.

NAME: Age at Testing
DESCRIPTION: Age of the specimen at the time of testing.

NAME: Chloride Content
DESCRIPTION: Indicates the chloride content of the concrete.

NAME: Maximum Aggregate Size
DESCRIPTION: Indicates the largest particle size in the aggregate.

NAME: Density Class
DESCRIPTION: Density class of the material.

NAME: Admixture Description
DESCRIPTION: Name of the Admixture.

NAME: Admixture Manufacturer
DESCRIPTION: Manufacturer of the Admixture.

NAME: Cement Batch Designation
DESCRIPTION: Description of the cement batch.

NAME: Binder Batch Description
DESCRIPTION: Description of the binder batch.

NAME: Contaminant Class
DESCRIPTION: Contaminant class of the item.

NAME: Hazard Class
DESCRIPTION: Hazardous materials classification.

NAME: Production Start
DESCRIPTION: Time of the beginning of the mixture's production.

NAME: Production End
DESCRIPTION: Time of the end of the mixture's production.

NAME: Number of Batches
DESCRIPTION: Number of included batches in the delivered mixture.

NAME: Type of Concrete
DESCRIPTION: Type of concrete: property-based or composition-based.

NAME: Max. Water-Cement Ratio (w/c eq)
DESCRIPTION: Key value for preparing materials with hydraulic binders.

NAME: Steel Fiber Addition
DESCRIPTION: Type of fiber addition to concrete: slow, medium, fast.

NAME: Energy Absorption Capacity
DESCRIPTION: Potential energy absorption of a concrete element until failure.

NAME: Air Temperature
DESCRIPTION: Temperature at arrival on the construction site.

NAME: Concrete Temperature
DESCRIPTION: Temperature of the concrete upon arrival at the site.

NAME: Mix Additions
DESCRIPTION: Describes binders, admixtures, and additives.

NAME: Notes
DESCRIPTION: Notes regarding the mix, delivery, and additions (free text).

NAME: Mix Design
DESCRIPTION: Standardized or custom mix design of the material.

NAME: Externally Monitored
DESCRIPTION: Is additional external control being performed?

NAME: Strength Class
DESCRIPTION: Strength/performance class of the delivered concrete.

NAME: Monitoring Class
DESCRIPTION: Level/class of monitoring required for the concrete.

NAME: Extended Workability Time
DESCRIPTION: Indicates the workability time after admixture use.

NAME: Max. Superplasticizer Quantity
DESCRIPTION: Maximum quantity of superplasticizer allowed on-site.

NAME: Retardation Time
DESCRIPTION: Time by which the addition of a retarder delays setting and heat development.

NAME: On-Site Product Addition
DESCRIPTION: Listed as a separate item with an ID referencing the main article.

NAME: Water Addition at Customer Request
DESCRIPTION: Listed as a separate item with an ID referencing the main article.

NAME: Additional Service
DESCRIPTION: Listed as a separate item with an ID referencing the main article.

NAME: Superplasticizer Addition at Customer Request
DESCRIPTION: Was superplasticizer added at the customer's request?

NAME: Retarder Addition at Customer Request
DESCRIPTION: Was retarder added at the customer's request?

NAME: Addition Location
DESCRIPTION: Location where the additives were added.

NAME: Quantity of Additive
DESCRIPTION: Quantity of the additive added.

NAME: Additive Name
DESCRIPTION: Name/designation of the additive.

NAME: Time of Addition
DESCRIPTION: Point in time when the additive was added.

CODE: Estimated Quantity of Concrete Before Addition
NAME: Estimated Concrete Quantity Before Addition
DESCRIPTION: Concrete quantity before adding the additive.

NAME: Consistency Range Before Addition
DESCRIPTION: Consistency range before additive was added.

NAME: Consistency Range After Addition
DESCRIPTION: Consistency range after additive was added.

NAME: Remaining Quantity in Vehicle
DESCRIPTION: Amount of item that remains in the vehicle and is not unloaded.
